member.summary: Uses Pythagoras' theorem to calculate the distance between two checkpoints.
member.param: The checkpoint we are looking for the distance from.

member.name: M:Air_Traffic_Simulation.AbstractCheckpoint.AddAllPossibleDestinations(System.Collections.Generic.List{Air_Traffic_Simulation.AbstractCheckpoint})
member.summary:
Shouldn't have to use this one any more.
Adds all checkpoints from a list to the reachable destinations of the checkpoint, from which the method has been called.
member.param: All the checkpoints we would like to add as reachable destinations.
